page.title: 10NIGHT LIFE IN LUTTERWORTH
page.content: I am Kate Johnson. I live in Lutterworth and I am a 13 year old girl. There is not much to do in Lutterworth that doesn't cost a lot of money. Normally I get home from school at about 4 p.m. On Mondays I stay in and do my{homework}or listen to music. Tuesdays I go to{Guides}and I have to wear a blue uniform. We do lots of activities. On Wednesdays I go to{Youth Wing,}where we can dance or play table tennis. I am Karina Ward and I am 13 years old. I live in Ullesthorpe, a small village 3 miles from Lutterworth. There are no clubs worthwhile in my village for a teenager so I visit Lutterworth a lot. I play badminton on a Friday night. Visits to Lutterworth are fewer in winter due to bad weather and darker nights.
